/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, with their lush green foliage, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the street, connecting different parts of the city. The image is bathed in the light of day, illuminating every detail and bringing the scene to life.
